title: Stewards of the Valley (Expansion)
content:
Stewards of the Valley expands Earthborne Rangers by adding new cards for each of the backgrounds and specialties from the core set, as well as adding new personality cards and new aspect cards. It also adds an entierly new background set (Talespinner) and a new specialty set (Spirit Speaker), both of which can be chosen at character creation.

New Concepts and Keywords

  • Aspiration (Keyword)
  • Deployed
  • Manifestation on Attributes
  • Disabled Thresholds
  • Spirit (Keyword)
  • Spiritspeaking
